### Total Score Calculation
The total score is calculated as the average of all element scores:
\[ \text{Total Score} = \frac{\sum \text{Element Scores}}{\text{Number of Elements}} = \frac{12.666667}{14} \approx 2.666667 \]

This comprehensive evaluation explains the alignment scores for both the total and individual elements.
